comments:
I20040422 + fix for bug 59739:

1. open any build.xml
2. go to the start of the file
3. type "<" (without the quotes)
3. invoke content assist or wait for autoactivation

I was seeing this when I was playing with bug 59739 also; however, when I self-
hosted a new workspace the problem went away.

parentName can return null and we should handle that case.
Changes to AntEditorCompletionProcessor#getProposalsFromDocument()
